SELECT bdi.id AS baseDrugId, di.id as drugId, dd.`price`, dd.`amount`, dd.`use_amount` AS useAmount, dd.`frequency`, mi.`common_name` AS commonName, sd1.`label` AS largeClass, sd2.`label` AS mediumClass, sd3.`label` AS smallClass, sd4.`label` AS pharmacologyClass, bdi.preparation_unit AS preparationUnit, sd5.`label` AS packageUnit, sd6.`label` AS minimumUnit, bdi.`product_code` AS productCode, bdi.`product_name` AS productName,bdi.`package_size` AS packageSize, bdi.`maximum_dose_in_unit` AS maximumDose, bdi.`maximum_dose_daily_in_unit` AS maximumDoseDaily, bdi.`use_amount`AS recommendUseAmount, bdi.`frequency` AS recommendFrequency, bdc.first_category AS firstCategory, bdc.sec_category AS secCategory, bdc.thir_category AS thirCategory, bdc.other_category AS otherCategory, bdc.main_ingredients AS mainIngredients, bdc.diseases AS diseases FROM drug_detail dd INNER JOIN drug_info di ON di.`id` = dd.`drug_id` INNER JOIN base_drug_info bdi ON bdi.`id` = di.`base_drug_id` INNER JOIN medicine_info mi ON mi.`id` = bdi.`medicine_id` INNER JOIN `base_drug_category` bdc ON bdc.product_code = bdi.`product_code` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd1 ON mi.`large_class` = sd1.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd2 ON mi.`medium_class` = sd2.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd3 ON mi.`small_class` = sd3.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd4 ON mi.`pharmacology_class` = sd4.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd5 ON bdi.`package_unit` = sd5.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd6 ON bdi.`minimum_unit` = sd6.`id`
where dd.`order_id` = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dd.del_flag = '0'

select dd.`price`, dd.`amount`, dd.`amount`, dd.`frequency`, mi.`common_name` as commonName, sd1.`label` as largeClass, sd2.`label` as mediumClass, sd3.`label` as smallClass, sd3.`label` as pharmacologyClass, bdi.`product_code` as productCode, bdi.`product_name` as productName,bdi.`package_size` as packageSize, bdi.`maximum_dose` as maximumDose, bdi.`maximum_dose_daily` as maximumDoseDaily, bdi.`use_amount`as recommendUseAmount, bdi.`frequency` as recommendFrequency, bdc.first_category as firstCategory, bdc.sec_category as secCategory, bdc.thir_category as thirCategory, bdc.other_category as otherCategory, bdc.main_ingredients as mainIngredients, bdc.diseases as diseases from drug_detail dd inner join drug_info di on di.`id` = dd.`drug_id` inner join base_drug_info bdi on bdi.`id` = di.`base_drug_id` inner join medicine_info mi on mi.`id` = bdi.`medicine_id` inner join `base_drug_category` bdc on bdc.product_code = bdi.`product_code` inner join sys_dict sd1 on mi.`large_class` = sd1.`id` inner join sys_dict sd2 on mi.`medium_class` = sd2.`id` inner join sys_dict sd3 on mi.`small_class` = sd3.`id`
